otherNames: 绝世医圣, Peerless Medical Saint, Peerless Divine Doctor, Unparalleled Medical Sage
synopsis: Four years ago, Xu Dong gave up his bright future and stood up for love, taking the blame for his fiancée and suffering all kinds of hardships. Four years later, he was reborn, but unexpectedly, his fiancée was about to marry his former friend. Xu Dong was furious and vowed to find out what was right and wrong. Unexpectedly, he was favored by the ancestor of Tianyi Sect. From then on, he embarked on the road of medical cultivation, saving the world and benefiting the world. Help from all sides came one after another, and his network resources continued.
